statements.query: MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(:AWSInspectorFinding)-[r:AFFECTS]->(:EC2Instance) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)
MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(:AWSInspectorFinding)-[r:AFFECTS]->(:ECRRepository) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)
MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(:AWSInspectorFinding)-[r:AFFECTS]->(:ECRImage) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)
MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(:AWSInspectorFinding)-[r:HAS]->(:AWSInspectorPackage) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)
MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(n:AWSInspectorFinding) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)
MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(n:AWSInspectorPackage) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)
